## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withParameter() method

Define a component parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withParameter(name: string, parameter: ParameterObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the parameter |
|  parameter | <code>ParameterObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the parameter |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
